00050 class _OgreRTSSExport RenderState : public RTShaderSystemAlloc
00051 {
00052 
00053     // Interface.
00054 public:
00055 
00057     RenderState();
00058 
00060     virtual ~RenderState();
00061 
00063     void reset();
00064 
00068     void addTemplateSubRenderState(SubRenderState* subRenderState);
00069 
00073     void removeTemplateSubRenderState(SubRenderState* subRenderState);
00074 
00076     const SubRenderStateList& getTemplateSubRenderStateList() const { return mSubRenderStateList; }
00077 
00086     void setLightCount(const int lightCount[3]);
00087 
00096     void getLightCount(int lightCount[3]) const;
00097 
00104     void setLightCountAutoUpdate(bool autoUpdate) { mLightCountAutoUpdate = autoUpdate; }
00105 
00110     bool getLightCountAutoUpdate() const { return mLightCountAutoUpdate; }
00111 
00112     
00113 
00114 
00115     // Attributes.
00116 protected:
00117     // The sub render states list.  
00118     SubRenderStateList mSubRenderStateList;
00119     // The light count per light type definition.
00120     int mLightCount[3];
00121     // True if light count was explicitly set.
00122     bool mLightCountAutoUpdate;
00123 
00124 private:
00125     friend class ProgramManager;
00126     friend class FFPRenderStateBuilder;
00127 };

00132 typedef RenderStateList::const_iterator         RenderStateConstIterator;
